 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (DiscretePathEffect)

Detailed Description

Chop the path into lines of segmentLength, randomly deviating from the original path by deviation. 

 //Example: draw a irragular contour rectangle with PathEffect on canvas
 //create path, paint
 Path path;
 Paint paint;
 paint.setColor(Color::BLACK);
 paint.setStyle(Paint::STYLE_STROKE);
 path.addRect(0.0, 0.0, 100.0, 100.0, Path::DIRECTION_CW);
 //create a base object - PathEffect
 PathEffect pe;

 //create a polymorphism object - DiscretePathEffect
 pe = new DiscretePathEffect(10.0, 10.0);
 paint.setPathEffect(pe);
 //draw on canvas
 canvas->drawPath(path, paint);
